title: FT/FS: Three Pattee's. Looking for a Sovereign Pattee. Want all 3 in trade?
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Three Pattee's. Looking for a Sovereign Pattee. Want all 3 in trade?
posts.post_content:
I have these 3 Pattee's available for trade. Looking for a Sovereign Pattee example.Can add cash for any deal if needed but I'm not looking for higher graded examples.  Preferably a 2 or under. If you have a Sovereign Pattee, would love to talk! Condition doesn't matter.....

Would be willing to trade all 3 for a Sovereign Pattee that has a whole back and isn't trimmed.  But will still consider trading for any example regardless.

bump for needing a sovereign only. Main post edited.

Still looking. Would love to see one even. Shoot me a pm if you have one even if not for sale.

Or take all 3 of mine in trade.....maybe more?
